title: Jay Shetty on Finding Your Purpose in a Chaotic World | BoF VOICES 2021
itunes:title: Jay Shetty on Finding Your Purpose in a Chaotic World | BoF VOICES 2021
itunes:subtitle: The best-selling author and podcaster shares a powerful equation for defining your purpose and a guided meditation to help you discover it.  At BoF VOICES 2021, Jay Shetty spoke about how his experiences as a monk taught him not only how to find...
description:
The best-selling author and podcaster shares a powerful equation for defining your purpose and a guided meditation to help you discover it. 

At BoF VOICES 2021, Jay Shetty spoke about how his experiences as a monk taught him not only how to find purpose, but how to live with it.

Join BoF Professional for the analysis and advice you need. Get 30 days for just $1 or explore group subscriptions for your business.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
